0.POPUP_ABOUT_ABOUT:
About Say.So

What is Say.So? Say.So is where your "say so" has value. This all started because we had been duped. Enticed into joining research panels with the promise that our opinions would matter, and that our input would be reflected in new or improved products. Instead, what we got was mailboxes filled with irrelevant surveys, points systems that offered very little reward, and no other way to demonstrate that we are mavens who should be revered.

Say.So's mission is to give you -- consumers, fans, brand acolytes, pundits -- an elegant way to more intimately connect with your favorite brands and affinities. In return, these companies learn how best to serve you, their customer. But, for this to truly mean something, the experience needs to be worthwhile.

Say.So's experience is unique in that it is a browser application, not a web page, so interacting with it doesn't require you to leave what you are doing. It's there when you are ready and keeps you notified of new surveys, content and rewards. The app offers a variety of surveys and polls, but also powers activities that are intrinsically motivating – quests, trivia... These test your mettle. Some are available to you out of the gate, but others need to be earned by leveling up or demonstrating your unique knowledge.

The more you participate, the more you gain, earning both experience points and currency points. Experience points are the currency of influence, earned by sharing your experience, expertise and opinion. These determine your status in the community, and reaching higher levels separates you as someone to be heard. Currency points are almost as good as cash and can be redeemed for a variety of unique and only available to you merchandise.

Say.So. What's yours?
0.POPUP_ABOUT_BILL_OF_RIGHTS:
Say.So Member Bill of Rights

In order to ensure members are openly and unequivocally made aware of the core values embodied by Say.So with which we imbue our member relations and product roadmap, we provide this Say.So Member Bill of Rights.

(1) Say.So

Above all else, members' say-so will be honored and exalted. Your influence, opinion and personal authority are the core reason for the existence of Say.So.

(2) Consent - Unambiguous Opt-In

By agreeing to participate in a Say.So community you accept that from time to time anonymous usage, behavioral, and poll/survey data will be collected, but we will never collect personally identifiable or sensitive information without your explicit permission.

(3) Anonymity

No personally identifiable information will be associated to your member account, ever. You will remain anonymous - what we know about you is what you agree to provide us. Period.

(4) Transparency

You have the right to know how Say.So uses your anonymous information and not see details buried deep in the "terms and conditions". Hence, this Bill of Rights, which will be posted in multiple, easily accessible places. We will also provide you several ways to provide feedback and input on how we're doing and hope you don't hesitate to share your thoughts, concerns, opinions, suggestions.

(5) Privacy

Say.So will keep all data you provide to us private - your email address, or personally identifiable info we may need to collect to send you rewards (e.g. name, physical address, phone number). This information will not be sold or given to third-parties. Not gonna happen.

(6) Fun

It is a member's right to enjoy themselves, and to let Say.So know what is fun, relevant and interesting, and what is lame and boring (please be kind). Though Say.So will sometimes need to ask you to do a few boring things so we can pay the bills, Say.So will always ensure the product roadmap reflects more fun stuff than boring stuff. We're listening!

(7) Reward

Say.So members have a right to be rewarded for their Say.So. That will be provided in the form of exclusive access and privileges, as well as through explicit rewards like redeemable points or simple cash.

3.ONBOARDING_TAB_1:
Welcome!

We've designed the steps below to help you get oriented with Movie Say.So. If you find you need additional help, please don't hesitate to contact us.

By becoming a member of Movie Say.So, you've achieved the level of "Extra", and you've also earned extra CineStars and CineBucks.


  • "CineStars" show the level of influence you've gained by sharing your expertise, experience and opinion. As you gain more CineStars your access to higher levels of influence on Movie Say.so will grow.
  • "CineBucks" are almost as good as cash. Virtually everything you do earns you CineBucks, which can be redeemed for all types of goodies from the Say.So Rewards Center.
3.ONBOARDING_TAB_2:
Give Your Opinion, Share It and Earn!

Your point of view and opinion are invaluable. Express yourself through fun polls and surveys, and earn points by rating videos.


  • Polls are quick hits of opinion we'd like you to share. Answer as many or as few as you'd like, and for each one we;ll drop a little something in your Movie Say.So wallet. Every day you'll get new polls to show off your movie knowledge so be sure to check back often.
  • Surveys are the big money opportunities. These are important efforts to gauge how we are doing, and we'll make sure you are compensated accordingly.
  • Spotlight - Rate movie trailers and videos; share them to Facebook or Twitter and we'll compensate you with CineBucks and CineStars. No purchase necessary.
3.ONBOARDING_TAB_3:
Here's What You Get.

Give us your opinion on movies , celebrities, and what's going on in Hollywood and you'll earn CineBucks, virtual currency redeemable for prizes and opportunities.


  • Great Prizes. Almost Almost everything you do as a Say.So movie buff earns you CineBucks. Use these to redeem prizes from the Rewards Center that are geared to movie lovers like you.
  • You can also exchange your CineBucks for entry tokens for our giveaways. Buy as many entry tokens for each giveaway as you want to increase your odds of winning.

3.POPUP_ABOUT_DOCUMENTS: Privacy Policy Rewards Rules EULA
3.POPUP_ABOUT_FAQ:
FAQ

What is Movie Say.So?
Members of Movie Say.So are rewarded for their film fandom by answering polls, participating in surveys, and rating new and retro movie trailers. Members gain "CineStars" (experience points) and "CineBucks" (currency). CineBucks can be redeemed for rewards and "Entry Tokens" into giveaways. (more...)

Do I have to pay for anything? Is there any shipping & handling fees for prizes obtained or won?
No, this is completely free to you. The only thing we want you to do is participate. (more...)

What are CineStars used for?
CineStars are the equivalent of experience points and determine your level of influence and involvement. Gaining CineStars will increase your Movie Say.So level. (more...)

What are CineBucks used for?
CineBucks are the currency you earn by participating in polls, answering surveys, and sharing your ideas. In fact, virtually everything you do in Movie Say.So will earn you CineBucks. CineBucks can be exchanged for various prizes and Entry Tokens in the Reward Center. (more...)

What are Entry Tokens?
Entry Tokens are your way of entering prize giveaways. Users that have purchased an Entry Token with their CineBucks will be entered to win the giveaway. At the end of each giveaway period a prize will be given away to a user that has purchased an Entry Token for the giveaway. You can buy as many Entry Tokens as you want to increase your chance of winning. (more...)

Do you really give away the prizes?
YES! Every prize that is won will be shipped within 4-6 weeks. Users and fans of Movie Say.So will get the prizes for playing, not the CEO's nephew or cousin. At the end of each giveaway we will send out an email to all the Movie Say.So users, letting you know who the lucky player is. (more...)

How do I get my prize?
When you win a prize we will contact you by email to get the information and mailing address needed to send the prize to you. (more...)

Are there any geographic restrictions for playing??
Yes, you must reside in the USA to redeem points for prizes. Unfortunately, we cannot ship items out of the USA. (more...)

Do I have to play every day?
No, you do not have to play every day, but the more you play and participate, the more CineBucks you can earn to exchange for Entry Tokens and other prizes. (more...)

Can I stop playing at any time?
Yes, particpate as much (or as little) as you want, but remember, the more you play the better your chances of winning cool prizes. (more...)

How long do the surveys / games take to complete?
Usually between 5 and 15 minutes. Generally, the longer the survey is, the more CineBucks you can earn. (more...)

What if I stop a survey in the middle of taking it? Do I still get credit? Do I have to restart it?
Once you start a survey you must complete it in order to earn your CineStars and CineBucks. (more...)

How often can I get CineStars/CineBucks for sharing??
For details on sharing, click here (more...)

What are you doing with the information you are collecting?
We use the opinions and information you give us to (a) provide your collective say-so to movie studio, producer & director clients to help inform their creative ideas for movies, marketing and other movie-related content; and (b) provide say.so members with a better Movie Say.So experience! (more...)

Can I trade my prize for another prize?
No, the prize you win, or redeem for, is the prize you get. (more...)

Can I track the status of the orders I have redeemed/won?
You will be sent a confirmation of your redemption or win. The delivery time of your item depends on the type of item you have redeemed or won. If you feel like there is a problem with your order, please contact us at movie@say.so. (more...)

What is the Promotion Period
Click here for detailed information on current, planned and previous giveaway information. (more...)

How do you select the winner(s)s for drawings?
You must redeem your CineBucks for Entry Tokens to be entered in the giveaways. Winners will be chosen at random from all entrants. (more...)

I am missing CineStars or CineBucks!
For missing CineStars or CineBucks (more...)

I have a question that is not included in this FAQ!
You can check HERE to see if there is an answer to a question that is not included in this FAQ. If you don't see your question or answer, please feel free to send your question using the feedback section.

How do I contact someone?
We value our users feedback, concerns, and suggestions and want to hear from you. You can contact us by sending us feedback section of the bar, or by emailing us directly at movie@say.so. You can also use http://www.twitter.com/saysoapp or http://www.facebook.com/moviesayso to get in touch or send feedback. (more...)

Where can I find the official Reward and Giveaway rules?
Links to the current Rules, Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policies are all located at the bottom of the 'Edit Profile' tab on the bar. You can also see them here.

How do I temporarily disable, or uninstall the Movie Say.So app?
Once registered, your account, CineBucks and content are always waiting for you, whether you have the app installed or not; but modern browsers are pretty slick now in letting us turn apps on and off without uninstalling them. You can leave Movie Say.So installed, and only activate it when you need it, or want to take advantage of a Movie Say.So offer, then deactivate it after you're done. No more uninstalling and reinstalling! Click here link for further instructions on how to disable this app.

How do I remove the Movie Say.So browser app?
For Movie bar removal instructions... (more...)

How do I link my Facebook or Twitter account?
You can check HERE for instructions on how to link your Facebook / Twitter account, or see below.

  1. Click .Edit Profile.
  2. Click to link your Twitter or Facebook account.
  3. Allow access in order for the accounts to be linked.

How do I disconnect my Facebook / Twitter account from the Say.So bar?
You can check HERE for instructions on how to unlink your Facebook / Twitter account, or see below.

Facebook:

  1. Log into Facebook.
  2. Click on Home > Account Settings.
  3. Click on Apps. You will see Say.So Bar listed here.

Twitter:

  1. Log into Twitter.
  2. Click on your name > Settings.
  3. Open the Applications tab and you will see the Say.So Bar listed here.

3.POPUP_ABOUT_HELP:
Need Help?

We've designed the steps below to help you get oriented with Movie Say.So. If you find you need additional help, please don't hesitate to contact us.

  • Welcome!
  • What Can I Do?
  • What Do I Get?
  • Get Started

Congratulations and Thank You!

By becoming a member of Movie Say.So, you've achieved level 1, and earned 1000 CineStars and 75 CineBucks.


  • "CineStars" show your level of influence in the Movie Say.So community. You earn them for sharing your expertise, experience and opinions. Your CineStars determine your access to higher levels of access and influence.
  • "CineBucks" are the virtual currency of Movie Say.So. Nearly about everything you do in the community earns you CineBucks, which can be exchanged for cool movie items in the Rewards Center.

Give Your Opinion, Share It and Earn!

Your point of view and opinion are invaluable. Express yourself through fun polls and surveys, and earn points by rating videos.

  • Polls are quick hits of opinion we'd like you to share. Answer as many or as few as you'd like, and for each one we;ll drop a little something in your Movie Say.So wallet. Every day you'll get new polls to show off your movie knowledge so be sure to check back often.
  • Surveys are the big money opportunities. These are important efforts to gauge how we are doing, and we'll make sure you are compensated accordingly.
  • Spotlight - Rate movie trailers and videos; share them to Facebook or Twitter and we'll compensate you with CineBucks and CineStars. No purchase necessary.

Here's What You Get.

Give us your opinion on movies, celebrities, and what's going on in Hollywood and you'll earn CineBucks, our virtual currency that you can redeem for prizes and opportunities.

  • Great Prizes. Almost everything you do as a Say.So movie buff earns you CineBucks. Exchange them for prizes in the Say.So Rewards Center, which is geared towards movie lovers like you.
  • You can also redeem your CineBucks for entry tokens for our special giveaways. The more tokens you get, the better your odds of winning.

Okay, Let's Get Started!


Completing the Profile Survey takes a minute, but we will reward you with a hefty amount of CineBucks and grant you automatic access to our giveaways.



Already taken the Profile Survey?
Check out some quick-hit activities.

4.POPUP_ABOUT_ABOUT:
About Machinima|Recon

Our mission is to give you -- our audience, fans, acolytes, pundits -- a better way to connect with Machinima. In return, we learn how best to serve you, our fans. But, for this to truly mean something, the experience needs to be worthwhile.

The Recon experience is unique in that it is a browser application, not a web page, so interacting with it doesn't require you to leave what you are doing. It's there when you are ready and keeps you notified of new surveys, content and rewards. The app offers a variety of surveys and polls, but is also full of fun stuff like - trivia, trailers, contests and content exclusive to Recon members. Some are available to you out of the gate, but others need to be earned by leveling up or demonstrating your unique knowledge.

The more you participate, the more you gain, earning both experience points (xp) and redeemable currency (coins). Experience points will get you more influence and are earned by sharing your experience, expertise and opinion. These determine your status in the community - reaching higher levels separates you from the crowd as someone to be heard.

Redeemable currency points are almost as good as cash and can be redeemed for all sorts of schwag, including Machinima gear.

We need you to take point in our mission to ever improve Machinima and our content offerings.

Recon!

4.POPUP_ABOUT_FAQ:
FAQ

What is Machinima | Recon?

Machinima | Recon is a way to directly influence the content seen on machinima.com. Members are rewarded by answering polls, participating in surveys, and giving their opinion about Machinima | Recon content. Members gain XP and Coins. Coins can be redeemed for Machinima | Recon rewards and "Entry Tokens" into Machinima | Recon giveaways. (more...)

Do I have to pay for anything? Is there any shipping & handling fees for prizes obtained or won?

No, this is completely free to you. The only thing we want you to do is participate. (more...)

What are Experience points (XP) used for?

XP are experience points and determine your level of influence and involvement. Gaining XP will increase your Machinima | Recon level. (more...)

What are Coins used for?

Coins are the currency you earn by participating in polls, answering surveys, and sharing your ideas. In fact, virtually everything you do in Machinima | Recon will earn you Coins. Coins can be exchanged for various prizes and Entry Tokens in the Reward Center. (more...)

What are Entry Tokens?

Entry Tokens are your way of entering prize giveaways. Users that have purchased an Entry Token with their Coins will be entered to win the giveaway. To view current giveaways. At the end of each giveaway period a prize will be given away to a user that has purchased an Entry Token for the giveaway. You can buy as many Entry Tokens as you want to increase your chance of winning. (more...)

Do you really give away the prizes?

YES! Every prize that is won will be shipped within 4-6 weeks. Users and fans of Machinima | Recon will get the prizes for playing, not the CEO's nephew or cousin. At the end of each giveaway we will send out an email to all the Machinima | Recon users, letting you know who the lucky player is. (more...)

How do I get my prize?

When you win a prize we will contact you by email to get the information and mailing address needed to send the prize to you. (more...)

Do I have to play every day?

No, you do not have to play every day, but the more you play and participate, the more XP and Coins you can earn to exchange for Entry Tokens and other prizes. (more...)

Can I stop playing at any time?

Yes, particpate as much (or as little) as you want, but remember, the more you play the better your chances of winning cool prizes. (more...)

How long do the surveys / games take to complete?

Usually between 5 and 15 minutes. Generally, the longer the survey is, the more XP and Coins you can earn. (more...)

What if I stop a survey in the middle of taking it? Do I still get credit? Do I have to restart it?

Once you start a survey you must complete it in order to earn your Machinima | Recon XP and Coins. (more...)

How often can I get XP/Coins for sharing??

For details on sharing, click here (more...)

What are you doing with the information you are collecting?

We are using it to help make Machinima | Recon better for everyone. (more...)

How do I disable the Machinima Recon bar?

You can temporarily disable the Machinima Recon bar by following these instructions.

Can I invite other people to play?

Yes, you can invite friends through Facebook or Twitter. You can also invite friends using our Send To A Friend feature found in the settings section of the bar. You can earn additional Coins by getting your friends to play. (more...)

Can I trade my prize for another prize?

No, the prize you win, or redeem for, is the prize you get. (more...)

Can I track the status of the orders I have redeemed/won?

You will be sent a confirmation of your redemption or win. The delivery time of your item depends on the type of item you have redeemed or won. If you feel like there is a problem with your order, please contact us at machinima@say.so. (more...)

What is the promotional period?

CLICK HERE for detailed information on current, planned and previous giveaway information.

How do you select the winner(s)s for drawings?

You must redeem your Coins for Entry Tokens to be entered in the giveaways. Winners will be chosen at random from all entrants. (more...)

I am missing Xp or Coins!

For missing XP or Coins (more...)

I have a question that is not included in this FAQ!

You can check HERE to see if there is an answer to a question that is not included in this FAQ. If you don't see your question or answer, please feel free to send your question using the feedback section.

How do I contact someone?

We value our users feedback, concerns, and suggestions and want to hear from you. You can contact us by sending us feedback section of the bar, or by emailing us directly at machinima@say.so. You can also use http://www.twitter.com/saysoapp or http://www.facebook.com/machinimarecon to get in touch or send feedback. (more...)

Where can I find the official Reward and Giveaway rules?

Links to the current Rules, Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policies are all located at the bottom of the 'Edit Profile' tab on the bar. You can also see them here.

How do I remove the Machinima | Recon browser extension?

If you want to remove the app from your browser, here are instructions for each major browser type. If you decide later to reinstall, use your original registration email and your coinage, level progress and earning will be there where you left off! For removal instructions click here.

How do I temporarily disable, or uninstall the Machinima | Recon browser extension?

Once registered, your account, Coins and content are always waiting for you, whether you have the app installed or not; but modern browsers are pretty slick now in letting us turn apps on and off without uninstalling them. You can leave Machinima | Recon installed, and only activate it when you need it, or want to take advantage of a Recon offer, then deactivate it after you're done. No more uninstalling and reinstalling!

How do I link my Facebook or Twitter account?

You can check HERE for instructions on how to link your Facebook / Twitter account, or see below.

  1. Click .Edit Profile.
  2. Click to link your Twitter or Facebook account.
  3. Allow access in order for the accounts to be linked.

How do I disconnect my Facebook / Twitter account from the Say.So bar?

You can check HERE for instructions on how to unlink your Facebook / Twitter account, or see below.

Facebook:

  1. Log into Facebook.
  2. Click on Home > Account Settings.
  3. Click on Apps. You will see Say.So Bar listed here.

Twitter:

  1. Log into Twitter.
  2. Click on your name > Settings.
  3. Open the Applications tab and you will see the Say.So Bar listed here.

  • 'Social PaySos' are almost as good as cash. Virtually everything you do earns you Social PaySos, which can be redeemed for all manner of goodies from Say.So. (see the Rewards Center)

Give Your Opinion, Share It and Earn!

Your point of view and opinion are invaluable. Express yourself through fun polls and surveys, and earn points by taking fun missions.


  • Polls are quick hits of opinion we'd like you to share. Answer as many or as few as you'd like, and for each one we'll drop a little something in your Say.so wallet.
  • Surveys are the big money opportunities. These are important efforts to gauge how we are doing, and we'll make sure you are compensated accordingly.
  • Spotlight - Challenge yourself and test your knowledge by taking fun missions, or share them to Facebook or Twitter. We'll compensate you with Social SaySo and PaySos. No purchase necessary.

5.POPUP_ABOUT_DOCUMENTS: Privacy Policy |  Rewards Rules |  EULA
5.POPUP_ABOUT_FAQ:
FAQ

What is Social Say.So?
Social Say.So is a way to get rewarded for your opinions on social and casual gaming. Members gain "Social SaySo" (experience points) and "Social PaySos" (currency). Social PaySos can be redeemed for rewards and "Entry Tokens" into Social Say.So giveaways. (more...)

Do I have to pay for anything? Is there any shipping & handling fees for prizes obtained or won?
No, this is completely free to you. The only thing we want you to do is participate. (more...)

What is Social SaySo used for?
Social SaySo determines your level of influence and involvement. Gaining Social SaySo will increase your Social Say.So level. (more...)

What are Social PaySos used for?
PaySos are the currency you earn by participating in polls, answering surveys, and sharing your ideas. In fact, virtually everything you do in Social Say.So will earn you PaySos. These PaySos can be exchanged for various prizes and Entry Tokens in the Reward Center. (more...)

What are Entry Tokens?
Entry Tokens are your way of entering prize giveaways. Users that have purchased an Entry Token with their PaySos will be entered to win the giveaway. To view current giveaways click on the giveaway section of the bar.
At the end of each giveaway period a prize will be given away to a user that has purchased an Entry Token for the giveaway.
You can buy as many Entry Tokens as you want to increase your chance of winning. (more...)

Do you really give away the prizes?
YES! Every prize that is won will be shipped within 4-6 weeks. Users and fans of Social Say.So will get the prizes for playing, not the CEO's nephew or cousin.
At the end of each giveaway we will send out an email to all the Social Say.So users, letting you know who the lucky player is. (more...)

How do I get my prize?
When you win a prize we will contact you by email to get the information and mailing address needed to send the prize to you. (more...)

Are there any geographic restrictions for playing??
Yes, you must reside in the USA to redeem points for prizes. We cannot ship items out of the USA. (more...)

Do I have to play every day?
No, you do not have to play every day, but the more you play and participate, the more PaySos you can earn to exchange for Entry Tokens and other prizes. (more...)

Can I stop playing at any time?
Yes, particpate as much (or as little) as you want, but remember, the more you play the better your chances of winning cool prizes. (more...)

How long do the surveys / games take to complete?
Usually between 5 and 15 minutes. Generally, the longer the survey is, the more PaySos you can earn. (more...)

What if I stop a survey in the middle of taking it? Do I still get credit? Do I have to restart it?
Once you start a survey you must complete it in order to earn your PaySos. (more...)

How often can I get SaySo/PaySos for sharing?
For details on sharing, click here (more...)

What are you doing with the information you are collecting?
We use the opinions and information you give us to (a) provide your collective say-so to gaming developers and companies to help inform their creative ideas for casual games, marketing and other social games related content; and (b) provide say.so members with a better Social Say.So experience! (more...)

Can I invite other people to play?
Yes, you can invite friends through Facebook or Twitter. You can also invite friends using our "Send To A Friend" feature found in the settings section of the bar. You can earn additional PaySos by getting your friends to play. (more...)

Can I trade my prize for another prize?
No, the prize you win or redeem is the prize you get. (more...)

Can I track the status of the orders I have redeemed/won?
You will be sent a confirmation of your redemption or win. The delivery time of your item depends on the type of item you have redeemed or won. If you feel like there is a problem with your order, please contact us at social@say.so. (more...)

What are Social Say.So missions?
Missions are multistage polls, quizzes and surveys that unlock exclusive badges, rewards and content. (more...)

What is the Promotion Period
Click here for detailed information on current, planned and previous giveaway information. (more...)

How do you select the winner for drawings?
You must redeem your Social PaySos for Entry Tokens to be entered in the giveaways. Winners will be chosen at random from all entrants. (more...)

I am missing Social SaySo or PaySos!
For missing SaySo or PaySos click here

I have a question that is not included in this FAQ!
You can check HERE to see if there is an answer to a question that is not included in this FAQ. If you don't see your question or answer, please feel free to send your question using the feedback section.

How do I contact someone?
We value our users feedback, concerns, and suggestions and want to hear from you. You can contact us through the feedback section of the bar, or by emailing us directly at social@say.so. You can also use http://www.twitter.com/saysoapp or http://www.facebook.com/socialsayso to get in touch or send feedback. (more...)

Where can I find the official Reward and Giveaway rules?
Links to the current Rules, Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policies are all located at the bottom of the 'Edit Profile' tab on the bar. (more...)

How do I temporarily disable, or uninstall the Social Say.So app?
Once registered, your account, Social PaySos and content are always waiting for you, whether you have the app installed or not; but modern browsers are pretty slick now in letting us turn apps on and off without uninstalling them. You can leave Social Say.So installed, and only activate it when you need it, or want to take advantage of a Social Say.So offer, then deactivate it after you're done. No more uninstalling and reinstalling! Click here for further instructions on how to disable this app.

How do I remove the Social Say.So browser extension?
If you want to remove the app from your browser, here are instructions for each major browser type. If you decide later to reinstall, use your original registration email and your PaySos, level progress and earning will be there where you left off! For removal instructions click here.

How do I link my Facebook or Twitter account?
You can check HERE for instructions on how to link your Facebook / Twitter account, or see below.

  1. Click "Edit Profile"
  2. Click to link your Twitter or Facebook account.
  3. Allow access in order for the accounts to be linked.

How do I disconnect my Facebook / Twitter account from the Say.So bar?
You can check HERE for instructions on how to unlink your Facebook / Twitter account, or see below.

Facebook:

  1. Log into Facebook.
  2. Click on Home > Account Settings.
  3. Click on Apps. You will see Say.So app listed here.
  4. Click on the app and then Remove App in the top right area of the application info box.

Twitter:

  1. Log into Twitter.
  2. Click on your profile icon (top right part of your screen) > Settings.
  3. Open the Applications tab and you will see the Say.So app listed here.
  4. Click on Revoke Access to remove the app.

Music Say.So can only ship items to the U.S. - PaySos will not be returned.
6.POPUP_REWARD_CENTER_TOKEN_DESCRIPTION:
Redeem your Music PaySos for Entry Tokens to win.
The more tokens you purchase the better your chance of winning.
6.POPUP_SURVEYS_ARCHIVED: We'd still love your opinion on these archived surveys, and you can still earn by completing them! Same deal – earn Music SaySo & PaySos for each one you complete.
6.POPUP_SURVEYS_NEW: Here's where your SaySo really counts! Complete surveys to earn Music SaySo & PaySos. Share surveys for bonus SaySo & PaySos and look for special surveys that are worth even more!
6.POPUP_SURVEY_DISQUALIFIED: Don't worry, we'll still give you some Music SaySo and PaySos for trying!
